string.name: app_name
string.context: Not translate

string.name: app_version
string.context: Not translate

string.name: full_description_text
string.context: Full description text of the app in the Google Play page of the app

string.name: short_description_text
string.context: Short description text of the app in the Google Play page of the app

resources.string: MEGA - это облачное хранилище данных с мощным и постоянно включенным режимом конфиденциальности. 50 ГБ дискового пространства бесплатно

string.name: general_total_size
string.context: label for the total file size of multiple files and/or folders (no need to put the colon punctuation in the translation)

string.name: general_x_of_x
string.context: Showing progress of elements. Example: 2 of 10.

string.name: general_yes
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_no
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_cancel
string.context: Answer for confirmation dialog.

string.name: general_move_to
string.context: When moving a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_copy_to
string.context: When copying a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_import_to
string.context: When importing a file to a location in MEGA. This is the text of the button after selection the destination

string.name: general_select
string.context: Selecting a specific location in MEGA. This is the text of the button

string.name: general_create
string.context: This is the final button when creating a folder in the dialog where the user inserts the folder name

string.name: general_upload
string.context: Button text when uploading a file to a previously selected location in MEGA

string.name: general_download
string.context: Item menu option upon right click on one or multiple files.

string.name: general_empty
string.context: Button to delete the contents of the trashbin. Can also be translated as "clear"

string.name: general_loading
string.context: state previous to import a file

string.name: general_importing
string.context: state while importing the file

string.name: general_import
string.context: Import button. When the user clicks this button the file will be imported to his account.

string.name: general_updating
string.context: state while upgrading the account

string.name: general_storage
string.context: Text listed before the amount of storage a user gets with a certain package. For example: "1TB Storage".

string.name: general_bandwidth
string.context: Text listed before the amount of bandwidth a user gets with a certain package. For example: "8TB Bandwidth". Can also be translated as data transfer.

string.name: general_error_word
string.context: It will be followed by the error message

string.name: general_not_yet_implemented
string.context: when clicking into a menu whose functionality is not yet implemented

string.name: general_already_downloaded
string.context: when trying to download a file that is already downloaded in the device

string.name: remove_key_confirmation
string.context: confirmation message before removing the previously downloaded MasterKey file

resources.string: Вы собираетесь удалить экспортированный файл мастер-ключа

string.name: export_key_confirmation
string.context: confirmation message before downloading to the device the MasterKey file

resources.string: Внимание! Эта операция очень рискованна. Хотите продолжить?

string.name: more_options_overflow
string.context: title of the menu for more options for each file (rename, share, copy, move, etc)

string.name: confirmation_remove_contact
string.context: confirmation message before removing a contact. Do not write question mark

string.name: confirmation_remove_multiple_contacts
string.context: confirmation message before removing mutiple contacts

string.name: action_change_mode_in
string.context: Folders that have been shared with the user from other MEGA users

string.name: action_change_mode_out
string.context: Folders that have been shared by the user to other MEGA users

string.name: action_logout
string.context: Button where the user can sign off or logout

string.name: action_add
string.context: Menu item

string.name: action_create_folder
string.context: Menu item

string.name: action_upload
string.context: Button text when choosing the destination location in MEGA

string.name: action_settings
string.context: Menu item

string.name: action_search
string.context: Search button

string.name: action_refresh
string.context: Menu item

string.name: action_sort_by
string.context: Menu item

string.name: action_help
string.context: Menu item

string.name: action_upgrade_account
string.context: Change from a free account to paying MEGA

string.name: action_select_all
string.context: Menu item to select all the elements of a list

string.name: action_unselect_all
string.context: Menu item to unselect all the elements of a list

string.name: action_grid
string.context: Menu item to change from list view to grid view

string.name: action_list
string.context: Menu item to change from grid view to list view

string.name: action_export_master_key
string.context: Menu item to let the user export the MasterKey

string.name: action_remove_master_key
string.context: Menu item to let the user remove the MasterKey (previously downloaded)

string.name: toast_master_key
string.context: success message when the MasterKey file has been downloaded

plurals.name: general_num_files
plurals.context: this is used for example when downloading 1 file or 2 files

item.context: Singular of file. 1 file
Plural of file. 2 files
Plural of file. 2 files
referring to a contact in the contact list of the user
Title of the contact list
Title of the contact list
Singular of folder/directory. 1 folder
Singular of folder/directory. many folder
Plural of folder/directory. 2 folders
Title of the incoming shared folders of a user in singular
Title of the incoming shared folders of a user in plural.
Title of the incoming shared folders of a user in plural.

plurals.name: general_num_downloads
plurals.context: in the notification. When downloading the notification is like 3 downloads.

item.context: Item menu option upon clicking on one or multiple files. Singular
Item menu option upon clicking on one or multiple files. Plural
Item menu option upon clicking on one or multiple files. Plural
Transfer type description in the active file transfer panel, can either be upload or download. Singular
Transfer type description in the active file transfer panel, can either be upload or download. Plural
Transfer type description in the active file transfer panel, can either be upload or download. Plural

plurals.name: general_num_users
plurals.context: used for example when a folder is shared with 1 user or 2 users

item.context: used for example when a folder is shared with 1 user
used for example when a folder is shared with 2 or more users
used for example when a folder is shared with 2 or more users

string.name: login_text
string.context: Login button

string.name: email_text
string.context: email label

string.name: password_text
string.context: password label

string.name: confirm_password_text
string.context: label shown in the confirmation of the password when creating an account

string.name: abc
string.context: in the password edittext the user can see the password or asterisks. ABC shows the letters of the password

string.name: dots
string.context: in the password edittext the user can see the password or asterisks. ··· shows asterisks instead of letters

string.name: new_to_mega
string.context: This question applies to users that do not have an account on MEGA yet

string.name: tour_text_1
string.context: Not translate. design text

string.name: tour_text_2
string.context: Not translate. design text

resources.string: Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus

string.name: create_account
string.context: label and text button when creating the account

string.name: login_logging_in
string.context: label when logging in to MEGA

string.name: error_enter_email
string.context: when the user tries to log in MEGA without typing the email

string.name: error_invalid_email
string.context: error when logging in to MEGA with an invalid email

string.name: error_enter_password
string.context: when the user tries to log in MEGA without typing the password

string.name: error_server_connection_problem
string.context: when the user tries to log in to MEGA without a network connection

resources.string: Ошибка сети, пожалуйста повторите попытку позже

string.name: login_generating_key
string.context: the first step when logging in is calculate the private and public encryption keys

string.name: login_connecting_to_server
string.context: Message displayed while the app is connecting to a MEGA server

string.name: error_incorrect_email_or_password
string.context: Error message when a login attempt fails.

resources.string: Неверный адрес электронной почты или пароль. Вы уже подтвердили электронную почту?

string.name: download_updating_filelist
string.context: Status text when updating the file manager

string.name: login_confirm_account
string.context: title of the screen after creating an account when the user has to confirm the password to confirm the account

string.name: login_querying_signup_link
string.context: when the user clicks on the link sent by MEGA after creating the account, this message is shown

string.name: login_confirming_account
string.context: Attempting to activate a MEGA account for a user.

string.name: login_preparing_filelist
string.context: After login, updating the file list, the file list should be processed before showing it to the user

string.name: create_account_text
string.context: button that allows the user to create an account

string.name: name_text
string.context: Name of the user

string.name: tos
string.context: text placed on the checkbox of acceptation of the Terms of Service

string.name: already_account
string.context: Does the user already have a MEGA account

string.name: create_account_no_terms
string.context: warning dialog

string.name: error_enter_username
string.context: Warning dialog

string.name: error_short_password
string.context: when creating the account

string.name: error_passwords_dont_match
string.context: when creating the account

resources.string: На введённый вами электронный адрес уже зарегистрирована учётная запись сервиса MEGA.

string.name: create_account_confirm_title
string.context: Title that is shown when e-mail confirmation is still required for the account

resources.string: Пожалуйста, проверьте почту и нажмите по ссылке, чтобы войти и подтвердить учётную запись

string.name: section_cloud_drive
string.context: The name of every users root drive in the cloud of MEGA. The term \'cloud\' is a new computer term and can probably not be translated. Do not translate "cloud" literal unless your language allows this. Please see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloud_computing for your reference.

string.name: section_saved_for_offline
string.context: title of the screen that shows the files saved for offline in the device

string.name: section_shared_with_me
string.context: title of the screen that shows all the folders that the user shares with other users and viceversa

string.name: section_rubbish_bin
string.context: The title of the trash bin in the tree of the file manager.

string.name: section_contacts
string.context: Title of the contact list

string.name: tab_contacts
string.context: Title of the contact tab. Capital letters

string.name: tab_sent_requests
string.context: Title of the sent requests tab. Capital letters

string.name: tab_received_requests
string.context: Title of the received requests tab. Capital letters

string.name: sent_requests_empty
string.context: the user has not sent any contact request to other users

string.name: received_requests_empty
string.context: the user has not received any contact request from other users

string.name: section_transfers
string.context: Title for the file transfer screen (with the up & download)

string.name: section_account
string.context: button to the settings of the user\'s account

string.name: section_photo_sync
string.context: title of the screen where the camera images are uploaded

string.name: used_space
string.context: Used space "5MB of 100MB".

string.name: tab_incoming_shares
string.context: Capital letters. Incoming shared folders. The title of a tab

string.name: tab_outgoing_shares
string.context: Capital letters. Outgoing shared folders. The title of a tab

string.name: file_browser_empty_cloud_drive
string.context: message when there are no files in the Cloud Drive

resources.string: На вашем Облачном Диске нет файлов

string.name: file_browser_empty_rubbish_bin
string.context: message when there are no files in the Rubbish Bin

string.name: file_browser_empty_incoming_shares
string.context: message when there are no incoming shared folders

string.name: file_browser_empty_outgoing_shares
string.context: message when there are no outgoing shared folders

string.name: file_browser_empty_folder
string.context: Text that indicates that a folder is currently empty

string.name: file_properties_activity
string.context: Menu item to show the properties dialog of files and or folders.

string.name: file_properties_available_offline
string.context: The files are available "offline" (without a network Wi-Fi mobile data connection)

string.name: file_properties_available_offline_on
string.context: Button state when a file can be saved for offline.(Capital letters)

string.name: file_properties_available_offline_off
string.context: Button state when a file is already saved for offline. (Capital letters)

string.name: file_properties_info_size_file
string.context: Refers to the size of a file.

string.name: file_properties_info_content
string.context: header of a status field for what content a user has shared to you

string.name: file_properties_info_added
string.context: when was the file added in MEGA

string.name: file_properties_info_modified
string.context: when was the file modified

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_private_folder
string.context: the folder is private. A public user can\'t access the folder

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_public_link
string.context: the label when a folder can be accesed by public users

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_full_access
string.context: Refers to access rights for a file folder.

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_read_write
string.context: Refers to access rights for a file folder. (with the & needed. Don\'t use the symbol itself. Use &)

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_read_only
string.context: Refers to access rights for a file folder.

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_shared_with
string.context: title of the screen that shows the users with whom the user has shared a folder

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_permissions
string.context: Item menu option upon clicking on a file folder. Refers to the permissions of a file folder in the file manager.

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_change_permissions
string.context: menu item

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_select_contact
string.context: menu item

string.name: file_properties_shared_folder_list_shares
string.context: when listing all the contacts that shares a folder

string.name: file_properties_send_file_select_contact
string.context: send a file to a MEGA user

string.name: contact_properties_activity
string.context: title of the contact properties screen

string.name: contact_file_list_activity
string.context: header of a status field for what content a user has shared to you

string.name: contact_shared_files
string.context: title of the screen where the folders are shown with the contact owner of those folders

string.name: contacts_list_empty_text
string.context: Adding new relationships (contacts) using the actions.

resources.string: Добавьте новые контакты, используя кнопку ниже.

string.context: Error message

string.context: Error message

string.context: notification message. Example: 1 file downloaded

string.context: Title header on the download page while the file is downloading.

string.context: message before the download or upload start

resources.string: Большинство устройств не может скачивать файлы размером более 4 ГБ. Загрузка скорее всего будет неудачной.

string.name: intent_not_available
string.context: message when trying to open a downloaded file but there isn\'t any app that open that file. Example: a user downloads a pdf but doesn\'t have any app to read a pdf

resources.string: На вашем устройстве отсутствует приложение для открытия этого файла.
